about_the_game:
Customize your Battle Snail with the Snowblaster Kit!
This kit includes the following items:

* The Snowblaster Weapon (Cannon Class)
* Winter Blue Snail and Shell Skin
* Winter Camouflage Helmet
* Orange Ski Mask with White Balaclava
* Radio Headphones
